About.paragraph: This project is an innovative attendance management system that leverages geolocation technology to ensure a secure and accurate attendance recording process. It streamlines the attendance process for both teachers and students in educational institutions. The system allows teachers to generate a unique One-Time Password (OTP) for each class session, which students must enter within a specified time limit to confirm their attendance. To further enhance the security and accuracy of the system, students must be within a certain proximity to the teacher's location when submitting their attendance. By utilizing this modern approach, the attendance management system offers a convenient, efficient, and reliable solution for tracking student attendance in a digital era.

Features.title: Geolocation Validation
Features.text: Ensure accurate attendance by verifying students' proximity to the teacher.

Features.title: Time-Bound OTPs
Features.text: Enhance security with OTPs that expire after a specified time, preventing misuse.

Features.title: Digital Record Keeping
Features.text: Easily track and store attendance data digitally for streamlined access and analysis.

Features.title: User-Friendly Interface
Features.text: Simple and intuitive interface for teachers and students, making attendance submission hassle-free.
